subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Enough of the BS
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
Who are you referring to? I have shared a few EVP's with this group asking
what they hear. I do this every time I get an EVP. I post them to all my
groups, not just this one.

On Thu, May 27, 2010 at 10:51 PM, bulletbabea <bulletbabea@...> wrote:

>
>
>
>
> You know its kind of humorous for me that those who have the desire to
> "discuss" thier different views are often the ones who do the least amount
> of actual research... as long as you have been in this group not once have
> you shared one evp. If you did then please refresh my memory. This seems to
> more about commenting on what others share for you than it is about doing
> any research yourself. Im not sure what you are looking for, if you are here
> to learn, correspond, or if you are just here to get a rise out of others
> but to be honest I do not have time for it.
>
> Whether Frank bans anyone or not is up to him entirely. But I have warned
> you before and I am saying it again. Cut the crap and move on. That goes for
> ALL of you. I dont mind discussions, I dont mind differences of opinion but
> I do mind BS.
>
> If you have research to share then do so, if your research yeilds no
> results then state it as such. If your only purpose for being in this group
> is to question others, disect them, and cause negative discussions then
> perhaps you are wasting your time here. You are definitely wasting mine.
>
> Misty
>
>  
>
